name: node-webcodecs
description: WebCodecs API implementation for Node.js using FFmpeg

scripts.build: npm run build:native && npm run build:ts
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:contracts && npm run test:guardrails
scripts.test:coverage:cpp: npm run build:coverage && npm test && lcov --capture --directory build --output-file coverage/cpp.info --no-external && genhtml coverage/cpp.info --output-directory coverage/cpp
